select sra.liability_flg, srm.countermeasures, srm.service_free_flg, mdl.name as model_name, m.ocm_shipping_date, coalesce(m.omr_notifi_no, m.sorc_no) as sorc_no, m.serial_no, m.ocm, m.ocm_rank, mdl.KIND, m.level, case when mdl.kind = 03 then '否' when m.ocm_rank = 0 then '-' when m.ocm_rank = m.level then '否' else '是' END change_rank, ld.comment, ld.nogood_description, p.code, 1 as quantity, sum(mpd.quantity * mpd.price) - coalesce(qp.charge_amount, 0) as price, 9 as belongs, sum(mpd.quantity * mpd.price) as loss_price from loss_detail ld right join material_partial_detail mpd ON ld.material_partial_detail_key = mpd.material_partial_detail_key join material_partial mp ON mpd.material_id = mp.material_id and mpd.occur_times = mp.occur_times join material m ON m.material_id = mp.material_id JOIN v_model mdl ON m.model_id = mdl.model_id JOIN partial p ON mpd.partial_id = p.partial_id join (select cast(material_id as unsigned) as material_id, service_repair_flg, service_free_flg, model_name, serial_no, rc_mailsend_date, countermeasures from service_repair_manage where material_id like '0%') srm ON `m`.material_id = srm.material_id left join service_repair_analysis sra ON sra.model_name = srm.model_name and sra.serial_no = srm.serial_no and sra.rc_mailsend_date = srm.rc_mailsend_date left join qis_payout qp ON qp.model_name = srm.model_name and qp.serial_no = srm.serial_no and qp.rc_mailsend_date = srm.rc_mailsend_date
srm.service_repair_flg = 1 and srm.service_free_flg in (2 , 3)
AND (m.ocm_shipping_date>=date_add(date_add(last_day(#{ocm_shipping_time}),interval 1 day),interval -1 month)) and (m.ocm_shipping_date <= last_day(#{ocm_shipping_time}))
AND (m.ocm_shipping_date>=date_add(date_add(last_day(#{ocm_shipping_date}),interval 1 day),interval -1 month)) and (m.ocm_shipping_date <= last_day(#{ocm_shipping_date}))
and mp.order_date=#{order_date}
group by m.material_id order by m.ocm_shipping_date ,sorc_no

select m.ocm_shipping_date, coalesce(m.omr_notifi_no, m.sorc_no) as sorc_no, mdl.name as model_name, m.serial_no, m.ocm, m.ocm_rank, mdl.KIND, m.level, case when m.ocm_rank = 0 then '-' when m.ocm_rank = m.level then '否' else '是' END change_rank, ld.liability_flg, ld.nogood_description, p.code, mpd.quantity, mpd.price, mpd.belongs, (mpd.price * mpd.quantity) as loss_price, ld.service_free_flg, ld.comment from loss_detail ld right join material_partial_detail mpd ON ld.material_partial_detail_key = mpd.material_partial_detail_key join material m ON m.material_id = mpd.material_id JOIN v_model mdl ON m.model_id = mdl.model_id JOIN partial p ON mpd.partial_id = p.partial_id
srm.service_repair_flg = 1 and srm.service_free_flg in (2 , 3)
and (m.ocm_shipping_date>=date_add(date_add(last_day(#{ocm_shipping_time}),interval 1 day),interval -1 month)) and (m.ocm_shipping_date <= last_day(#{ocm_shipping_time}))
order by m.ocm_shipping_date ,sorc_no
